channel.title: YearInSport on PLA Cycling Log
channel.description: Recent content in YearInSport on PLA Cycling Log

item.title: Strava Year In Sport 2018
item.description: I have mixed feelings. Don't know whether to feel a level of accomplishment or be embarrassed. Spent about 500 hours or 20 days in 2018 on my bicycle. Those 8.5 thousand miles were mostly fun so what the hay.
